com.fluidops.fedx.algebra

Class ExclusiveGroup

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.openrdf.query.algebra.QueryModelNodeBase
      • com.fluidops.fedx.algebra.ExclusiveGroup
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    FilterTuple, QueryRef, StatementTupleExpr, java.lang.Cloneable, org.openrdf.query.algebra.QueryModelNode, org.openrdf.query.algebra.TupleExpr

    public class ExclusiveGroup
extends org.openrdf.query.algebra.QueryModelNodeBase
implements StatementTupleExpr, FilterTuple
    Represents a group of statements that can only produce results at a single endpoint, the owner.
    Author:
    Andreas Schwarte
